snippet: Adam Aron stepped down as the chief executive of the Philadelphia 76ers and was replaced by the former Madison Square Garden Sports president Scott O’Neil.
abstract: Philadelphia 76ers chief executive Adam Aron steps down and is replaced by former Madison Square Garden Sports president Scott O'Neil.
lead_paragraph: Adam Aron stepped down as the chief executive of the Philadelphia 76ers and was replaced by the former Madison Square Garden Sports president Scott O’Neil.
